message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I believe the product's value is closer to my initial offer.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my initial offer and your latest one. How about $13,250?
